content:
As a recent customer, you might be eligible for some exclusive promotions or loyalty rewards. Here are a few things I found out:

1. **Welcome Series**: Glowing Skin has a welcome series program that offers exclusive discounts and rewards to new customers. Since you've made a purchase recently, you might have already received an email with a 15% off code for your next purchase. If you haven't received it, you can contact their customer service to check if you're eligible.
2. **Birthday Offer**: Glowing Skin offers a birthday reward to their loyalty program members. If your birthday is coming up, you might receive a special discount code or a free gift with your next purchase.
3. **Tiered Loyalty Program**: Glowing Skin has a tiered loyalty program that rewards customers based on their purchase history. As you accumulate points, you can unlock new tiers with exclusive benefits, such as:
	* **Glowing Insider** (0-99 points): 10 points for every $1 spent, exclusive access to new products, and early access to sales.
	* **Glowing Pro** (100-299 points): All Glowing Insider benefits, plus 15% off all purchases, and free standard shipping on all orders.
	* **Glowing Elite** (300+ points): All Glowing Pro benefits, plus 20% off all purchases, free expedited shipping, and a free product of your choice (up to $50 value) on your birthday.
4. **Refer-a-Friend Program**: Glowing Skin has a refer-a-friend program that rewards you with 20% off your next purchase when you refer a friend who makes a purchase. Your friend will also receive 20% off their first purchase.
5. **Exclusive Offers**: Keep an eye on your email inbox for exclusive offers and promotions from Glowing Skin. They often send targeted emails to their loyalty program members with special deals, early access to new products, or limited-time discounts.

To take advantage of these promotions and loyalty rewards, make sure to:

* Sign up for their loyalty program (if you haven't already) to start earning points and unlocking benefits.
* Keep an eye on your email inbox for exclusive offers and promotions.
* Check your account dashboard or loyalty program page for available rewards and benefits.
* Contact Glowing Skin's customer service if you have any questions or concerns about their promotions or loyalty program.

I hope this helps you get the most out of your Glowing Skin experience!
